data.text: @GMA @ABCWorldNews @LinseyDavis wishing her only the best, she is a beautiful soul and bright light for many

@GMA @ABCWorldNews @LinseyDavis At some point accountable must take place. It's not impossible 2 overcome ppl w/less do it all the time. The MSM/HW enables & coddles this behavior. I find it so selfish 2 have so much access & good that could be released into the universe but u make the conscience decision 2 use
@Jackson39327953 @GMA @LinseyDavis Because she is, she an addict, which mean she can’t control herself. But she helped millions of people. Watch her documentary

@GMA @LinseyDavis All that money & still can't love herself & be happy. 😕 Girl needs to address her other issues 1st, (bipolar; bulimia) before trying to criticize or help others. Know if she doesn't quit soon she's not going to make 40, while looking over 40. 😫

@GMA @LinseyDavis She is human just like all of us
Praying she gets the help she needs

@GMA @LinseyDavis Now that you've reported it let's all give doped out demi all the privacy she needs and hopefully she goes away for good I know my kids can no longer listen to someone so weak and frankly pathetic
@GMA @LinseyDavis This young lady needs to get her addiction under control before she ends up like Amy Winehouse . I know she can do it !
